para.text: Subject to §B, below, when a unit of State government seeks reimbursement from the State Insurance Trust Fund for an occurrence of loss, damage, or liability, the unit shall file its claim with the Treasurer within 60 days after the unit discovers the loss, damage, or liability.
If the unit discovers an occurrence of loss, damage, or liability in June, it shall file its claim for reimbursement with the Treasurer before July 20th of the next fiscal year.

Unless otherwise required by statute or these regulations, a claim of a unit of State government under any insurance program provided by the Treasurer may not be accepted for theft or other disappearance of its personal property.
A unit of State government shall be solely responsible for the care and custody of its property.

annotations.annotation: State Finance and Procurement Article, §§9-104 and 9-105; State Government Article, §12-101 et seq; Annotated Code of Maryland
